titleStmt.title: An essay of moral rules observed in the use of medicinal remedies in order unto their success. Being a discourse of the causes of the decay of natural health, and brevity of humane life in this present age. By J. M.
titleStmt.author: J. M.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed Tho. Cockeril, at the [Three] Legs in the Poultery,

notesStmt.note: With a caption title on A2: An essay, representing those moral rules requisite to be observed in the use of medicinal remedies.
With an advertisement on the verso of E6.
Copy catalogued imprint partly illegible; title page stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
